results.title: Metformin attenuates sepsis-induced neuronal injury and cognitive impairment

results.title: Not only metformin, but also D-allulose, alleviates metabolic disturbance and cognitive decline in prediabetic rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_psicose @CHEMICAL_MESH:C003243 @@@D-allulose@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ equally attenuated brain oxidative stress, brain mitochondrial ROS production, hippocampal apoptosis, brain @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin insensitivity@@@, hippocampal @<m>DISEASE_Night_blindness_congenital_stationary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536122 @@@synaptic dysfunction@@@, resulting in improved learning process in prediabetic @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Pratchayasakul W, Jinawong K, Pongkan W, Jaiwongkam T, Arunsak B, Chunchai T, Tokuda M, Chattipakorn N, Chattipakorn SC. Not only metformin, but also D-allulose, alleviates metabolic disturbance and cognitive decline in prediabetic rats. Nutr Neurosci. 2022 Jun;25(6):1115-1127. PMID: 33151133
